#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>

struct Item {
    int first;
    int second;
};

int compare(const void *a, const void *b) {
    struct Item * itemA = (struct Item*)a;
    struct Item * itemB = (struct Item*)b;
    return  ( itemB->first - itemA->first );
}

int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    
    struct Item * arr = (struct Item*)malloc(n * sizeof(struct Item));
    if (arr == NULL) { 
        // handle error, but practical scenario may assume sufficient memory
    }
    
    for(int i=0; i <n; i++) {
        scanf("%d %d", &arr[i].first, &arr[i].second);
    }
    
    qsort(arr, n, sizeof(struct Item), compare);
    
    struct Item current_a = arr[0];
    
    int found =0;
    for(int i =1; i <n ;i++) {
        struct Item item = arr[i];
        if (item.second > current_a.second) {
            found =1;
            break;
        } else {
            current_a = item;
        }
    }
    
    if (found) {
        printf("Happy Alex\n");
    } else {
        printf("Poor Alex\n");
    }
    
    free(arr);
    return 0;
}
